import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import '../../../assets/bootstrap-4.1.3-dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css'; import '../../../assets/bootstrap-4.1.3-dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import Header from '../../components/Header'; import './Cadastro.css' import Footer from '../../components/Footer'; export default function Cadastrar({history}){ const [menu, setMenu] = useState(true); const [cadastro, setCadastro] = useState(false); const [login, setLogin] = useState(false); function realizarLogin(){ setLogin(true); setCadastro(false); setMenu(false); } function realizarCadastro(){ setLogin(false); setCadastro(true); setMenu(false); } function exibirMenu(){ setLogin(false); setCadastro(false); setMenu(true); } function topFunction() { document.body.scrollTop = 0; document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0; } return(
